text: thumb Pierre-Alain Muet (born 1 January 1945 in Lyon) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Rhône department from 2007 to 2017, as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lyon Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Pierre-Alain Muet
